display_long_description:
**The world’s most legendary board game reimagined with magic, battles, and VR.**

Whether you're here to relax, learn, or compete, Merlin’s Chess brings strategy and fantasy together in the most immersive way possible.

# Includes:

**🚨 Official CHESS.COM Integration!**

Challenge over 200 million Chess.com users, or play against official Chess.com Bots of the world champions, athletes, and celebrity content creators. Enjoy first-of-kind cross-play.
[media]

**♟️ Animated Chessboards**

Massive or tabletop-sized pieces come to life and clash each other with sound and visual effects.
[media]

**✋🏻 Full Hand Tracking Support**
[media]

**🎙️ Voice Commands**

Command the board like a true wizard. Use natural language to move pieces, and perform in-game actions.[media]

**🎨 Environments & Piece Sets**

Choose between various theme options to craft your own gameplay experience.[media]

**🌐 Multiple Game Modes**

Use Casual/Ranked modes to play chess with popular Time Controls. Switch to Spectator Mode to join others and make it a Chess Party, or test your skills against AI opponents in AI Mode.[media]

**👫Make New Friends**

Customizable Avatars, Voice Chat, and Friendship System. Find your people, or bring your own. Includes safety features like Mute & Block.[media]

# Upcoming Features
- Puzzle Mode
- Mixed Reality Support
- Merlin's Chess Academy
- New Environments, Piece Sets, AI Opponents

Challenge over 200 million Chess.com users, or play against official Chess.com Bots of the world champions, athletes, and celebrity content creators. Enjoy first-of-kind cross-play.

**🎨 Environments & Piece Sets**

Choose between various theme options to craft your own gameplay experience.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499296266_1009389674718098_2104839521647028073_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=glWFdOjb-gcQ7kNvwHa_4ez&_nc_oc=AdmTAgv6r2Jaoj6YwvjGmmPngo5DrHd11uabGdDp6RRjDqe5QoSgjPQhTlRS7vy7fpE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cOf0foMfDDcXnv0dmotYWw&oh=00_AfPhWoWCVT_o8oi0t6snI9k2citoF1h1seEO6C5aXxhp5g&oe=6857E849)

**🌐 Multiple Game Modes**

Use Casual/Ranked modes to play chess with popular Time Controls. Switch to Spectator Mode to join others and make it a Chess Party, or test your skills against AI opponents in AI Mode.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499318760_1397490298044875_3562805842408108113_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lUmqdOFoX0gQ7kNvwFhqQlI&_nc_oc=AdkNnVa_2b2F9OXtCgkUiTa2m8wA3obYoNUQ7KTIHSqxY9I1JTu35a7yJJ_Nx04pCw8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cOf0foMfDDcXnv0dmotYWw&oh=00_AfOx_FnVwWnOI_r_D5dCWG_hE5moDUwa6a64sn11Q6GvMg&oe=6857D3A9)

**👫Make New Friends**

Customizable Avatars, Voice Chat, and Friendship System. Find your people, or bring your own. Includes safety features like Mute & Block.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499310899_9786339248068928_937922751158091890_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=iKWGXzLBfmAQ7kNvwFy4Vuy&_nc_oc=AdlISViARnfEZb9tZZHsH2RaGbeePUKVFYYCwo9YId0GQu06Fdc3Wc3sYnWiFX7u_9s&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=cOf0foMfDDcXnv0dmotYWw&oh=00_AfNpxWUGTy_oGr1mA6cudw3hozXBT-pD2swZakDOjXD7gw&oe=6857F622)
